thread.title: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS
thread.title_full: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS

author: wtopstaff
title: Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS
text:
Home » News » Sports » Nats ace Scherzer to… Nats ace Scherzer to join Fox studio show during ALCS By The Associated Press October 14, 2015 6:43 pm 
LOS ANGELES (AP) — Washington Nationals ace Max Scherzer will join Fox’s studio show during the AL Championship Series. 
Scherzer earlier this month became only the sixth major league pitcher to throw two no-hitters in the same season. 
The network said Wednesday that he will join analysts Raul Ibanez, Pete Rose and Frank Thomas for pregame and postgame coverage starting with Friday’s Game 1. Topics:
